posts.title: Conversation with a roommate.
posts.content:
Roomie: “How many times is that fucker gonna run?!”

Me: “Well Harris isn’t exactly a great choice.”

Roomie: “But she’s not Trump so that’s a win.”

Me: “What does she have to offer?”

Roomie: “Well…uh….she isn't Trump.”

We are dealing with absolute fuckwads.

posts.title: ⭐ We only get ONE chance on Election Day! ⭐
posts.content:
Patriots, we remain at the same disadvantage as we've ever been for that last eight years. The RNC isn't doing ANYTHING to #StopTheSteal. If our enemies steal this election, there is no lawyer, judge or court that can redeem it. We only get ONE chance on Election Day.

If you're NOT applying to be a poll worker, you're part of the problem. YOUR inaction benefits our enemies -- there's ONLY us, We the People, to save this election!

SIGN UP TODAY!

posts.raw_content:
Patriots, we remain at the same disadvantage as we've ever been for that last eight years. The RNC isn't doing ANYTHING to #StopTheSteal. If our enemies steal this election, there is no lawyer, judge or court that can redeem it. We only get ONE chance on Election Day. 

**If you're NOT applying to be a poll worker, you're part of the problem.** YOUR inaction benefits our enemies -- there's ONLY us, **We the People**, to save this election!

**SIGN UP TODAY!**

**Alabama**

* [All Counties](https://www.sos.alabama.gov/alabama-votes/become-poll-worker)
* [Jefferson County](https://jeffcoprobatecourt.com/elections/pollworkers/)
